      • addServletMapping

        public void addServletMapping(java.lang.String pattern,
                              java.lang.Class<? extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet> servletClass,
                              int processOrder)
        Maps a new Servlet to the server. This operation can be performed after the server is started.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The URL pattern which will trigger the servlet
        servletClass - The servlet Class object. Usually obtained by MyServlet.class
        processOrder - The priority for this servlet to be executed. The smaller the processOrder is, the higher priority this entry is.

      • addServletMapping

        public void addServletMapping(java.lang.String pattern,
                              java.lang.String servletClass,
                              int processOrder)
                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Maps a new Servlet to the server. This operation can be performed after the server is started.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The URL pattern which will trigger the servlet
        servletClass - The fully qualified name for the servlet
        processOrder - The priority for this servlet to be executed. The smaller the processOrder is, the higher priority this entry is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • addServletMapping

        public void addServletMapping(java.lang.String pattern,
                              java.lang.String servletClass)
                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Maps a new Servlet to the server with default priority. This operation can be performed after the server is started.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The URL pattern which will trigger the servlet
        servletClass - The servlet Class object. Usually obtained by MyServlet.class
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • deleteServletMapping

        public int deleteServletMapping(java.lang.String pattern,
                                java.lang.Class<? extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet> servlet)
        Delete all servlet mapping with matching URL pattern and servlet class
        Parameters:
        pattern - The URL pattern
        servlet - The servlet Class object. Usually obtained by MyServlet.class
        Returns:
        number of mapping entry removed

      • deleteServletMapping

        public int deleteServletMapping(java.lang.String pattern,
                                java.lang.String servlet)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Delete all servlet mapping with matching URL pattern and servlet class
        Parameters:
        pattern - The URL pattern, null if this URL pattern should be ignored
        servlet - The fully qualified name for the servlet, null if class name should be ignored
        Returns:
        number of mapping entry removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
